name: order-management-microservices
description: Modernized Order Management System with microservices architecture

scripts.build:all: npm run build:lib && npm run build:order && npm run build:invoice
scripts.migrate:validate: ts-node -e "(async () => { const { MigrationService } = await import('./lib/src/migration/migration.service'); const { PrismaService } = await import('./lib/src/database/prisma.service'); const service = new MigrationService(new PrismaService()); const result = await service.validateMigration(); console.log(JSON.stringify(result, null, 2)); })()"
scripts.reconciliation:run: ts-node -e "(async () => { const { ReconciliationService } = await import('./lib/src/reconciliation/reconciliation.service'); const { PrismaService } = await import('./lib/src/database/prisma.service'); const service = new ReconciliationService(new PrismaService()); const result = await service.runFullReconciliation(); console.log(JSON.stringify(result, null, 2)); })()"
scripts.db:migrate: cd lib && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:migrate:prod: cd lib && npx prisma migrate deploy
